header_text: You are an avid traveler but have recently had mobility challenges and frequent fatigue. You worry about how this will impact your ability to explore new destinations and maintain a fast-paced lifestyle. The more you think about it, the more you become hopeless.

elements.Text: The thought of exploring close to home makes you feel...
